00022         input_options *options;
00023         cipher_cont *cipher=NULL;

00025         
00026         if((options=MALLOC(input_options))==NULL){
00027                 fprintf(stderr,"ERROR: FAILED TO ALLOCATE MEMORY\n");
00028                 exit(1);
00029         }

00032          */

00036                         fprintf(stderr,"ERROR: NO INPUT FILE");

00042                 return(1);

00044         /* create report*/

00047         cipher=read_input(options->inputfile);
00048         /* perform tabu search */
00049         fprintf(stdout,"INIT TABU SEARCH\n");
00050         tabusearch(cipher,options,report);
00051         fprintf(stdout,"END TABU SEARCH\n");
